descriptor.name: Colgate Strong Teeth 400
descriptor.short_desc: Colgate Strong Teeth, 300g with Free Toothbrush, India’s No: 1 Tooth
descriptor.long_desc: Colgate Strong Teeth, 300g with Free Toothbrush, India’s No: 1 Toothpaste Brand, Calcium-boost for 2X Stronger Teeth, Prevents cavities, Whitens Teeth, Freshens Breat About this item COLGATE STRONG TEETH is India’s no.1 toothpaste for stronger teeth for you and your family. As per Kantar Worldpanel Apr '23 report, it's the No.1 penetrated toothpaste in India, and has the highest volume share within the Toothpastes category. NOURISHED Teeth are important as our teeth are losing calcium every day we eat sugary or junk food. COLGATE STRONG TEETH NOURISHES teeth by boosting the process of natural calcium reabsorption from the saliva. NOURISHED TEETH are 2X STRONGER with COLGATE STRONG TEETH's unique Calcium Boost + Arginine Formula. STRENGTHENS TEETH, PREVENTS CAVITIES, Whitens Teeth and Freshens Breath. RECOMMENDED USAGE: Brush twice a day for 2 minutes each time. 100% VEGAN, Gluten-Free and responsibly made.

descriptor.name: Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel 50
descriptor.short_desc: Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel | Glowing
descriptor.long_desc: Auli Magic Potion Non-Sticky Oil Control Aloe Vera Gel | Glowing, Moisturizing, Makeup Primer | Made with 99.9% Pure Aloe Vera & Turmeric Extract | Refreshing Hydration, All Skin Types  About this item # DETOXIFIES : This small jar of aloe helps pull out all kinds of toxic elements present in the skin. It, in turn, helps your skin glow and shine without any visible skin issues. # HERBAL TREAT FOR YOUR SKIN : Enriched with the goodness of aloe vera extracts, and turmeric, this absolutely soothing gel enhances the skin quality, leaving it with a youthful glow. # A SOLUTION TO SEVERAL SKIN PROBLEMS : Aloe vera and turmeric extracts help fight skin problems like tan, pigmentation, acne, pimple, rosacea, skin infections, dark spots, and sunburns. # PRIMES YOUR SKIN : Magic Potion also works as a primer that acts like a layer of protection between your skin and the makeup you apply. # PURE AND CHEMICAL FREE : It is purely Ayurvedic and organic with ZERO synthetics, parabens, Sulfates or added preservatives. This gel is non-sticky, and has a matte finish. Compared to other aloe vera gel based products, this gel gives a smoother finish. # SUITS ALL SKIN TYPES : Applying it onto clean dry skin, as a moisturizer or hydrating gel will help maintain the quality of your skin.

descriptor.name: WOW Skin Science Rosemary Oil Biotin Hair Growth Kit 100
descriptor.short_desc: WOW Skin Science Rosemary Oil & Biotin Hair Growth Kit - Complete
descriptor.long_desc: WOW Skin Science Rosemary Oil & Biotin Hair Growth Kit - Complete Care for Breakage-Prone Hair - Oil, Shampoo, Conditioner - 700ml   About this item Hair growth hair care regime: Nourish, cleanse and protect your brittle, breakage-prone hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Hair Care Kit. The kit offers you a three-step hair care regime to repair, strengthen and protect your hair against breakage and hair loss. The kit has WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Hair Oil, Shampoo and Conditioner. Stimulates scalp and roots: As step 1, apply WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Hair Oil. It is a lightweight, fast-absorb, hair-growth hair oil infused with rosemary oil, biotin and hibiscus extracts that stimulates your sluggish scalp and helps to promote hair growth. This anti hair fall hair oil helps to boost circulation to the roots, nourishes the scalp to help promote hair growth and enhance hair density. Cleanses and strengthens hair: As step 2, wash your hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Shampoo. It is infused with antioxidant rich rosemary oil, biotin and moringa oil that strengthen roots to reduce hair fall and boost hair growth. It is a gentle anti-hair fall shampoo that cleanses your scalp and hair thoroughly. It helps to remove build-up without stripping off moisture from strands. Leaves hair looking healthy, lush, lustrous and voluminous. Protects and detangles hair: As step 3, condition your strands with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Conditioner. It is a softening hair conditioner infused with antioxidant rich rosemary oil, biotin and moringa oil. This anti-hair loss, creamy conditioner helps to moisturize and smoothen each strand. This vitamin enriched hair strengthening conditioner makes hair glossy and adds bounce. It restores softness and shine to dull, brittle hair. Made With Natural Actives That Promote Hair Growth: This anti hair fall hair care kit has natural ingredients like rosemary oil, biotin, hibiscus extract and moringa oil. Rosemary extract present in the oil is rich in manganese, carnosol acid and vitamin C. It helps to boost stimulation to the roots, soothe itchy scalp and prevent hair loss. Biotin, also called vitamin H, nourishes roots, reduces damage and strengthens strands. Benefits of Using WOW Skin Science Products: Well, they have none of those harmful chemicals like parabens, mineral oil, silicones, sulphate, artificial fragrance or color. The products have a high concentration of activated natural and are pH balanced. They are dermatologically tested. Fight hair fall with rosemary and biotin Get lustrous, voluminous hair with WOW Skin Science Rosemary With Biotin Anti Hair Fall Kit. It is an easy-to-use, 3-step, hair growth boosting hair care regime to add volume and shine to thin, breakage-prone hair.

descriptor.name: Sanfe Intimate Lightening Serum 50
descriptor.short_desc: Sanfe Intimate Lightening Serum - 50g | For Dark Underarms
descriptor.long_desc: Sanfe Intimate Lightening Serum - 50g | For Dark Underarms, Inner Thighs, Knees And Bikini Area | With Kojic Acid, Vitamin C, Natural Lemon and Mulberry Extracts | Serum| MSDS & COA Certified About this item:-  NO CHEMICALS OR PETROLEUM BYPRODUCTS - No petroleum byproducts or harmful chemicals were used in the making. PLANT-BASED FORMULA - 100% natural extracts of Hibiscus, Orange peel, Moringa oil and Licorice extracts form the core of this serum. ANTI-MICROBIAL & ANTI-AGEING - The bioactives present in Licorice extracts and Moringa Oil protect the skin of the intimate area from bacteria, fungus and free radicals. EASY TO APPLY - The serum comes in an airless pump tube which makes application easy and helps you make use of every ounce of the product. NO MORE DISCOLOURATION - The serum effectively treats dark spots, acne scars, hyperpigmentation, and skin discoloration due to friction in the intimate areas.
